title: From the Apennines to the Andes
resume: Italy is in a deep depression, so to support her family, Marco's  mother goes to Argentina to work as a domestic. But after she writes to  her family that she is sick, her letters stop coming. So Marco decides  to go to Argentina to look for her. He travels across Argentina to find  her, meeting many wonderful people, and having many adventures during  his journey.
